body:
@Dowxy  MC boy gradually fall in love with each other when they get along with MC girl

So yes, the is good end
@Dowxy the hero we need not the one we deserve
This artist is my favorite H artist. I came across his/her works on hentai cafe but there's only few there. I hope nanigawa rui's works gets translated to english.
@Dowxy: thx for explanation so we can see a better picture of what was going on.

MC girl has the same interest as MC boy "watching AV" and been going to MC boy house ever since she found out his interest. she told him she had sex once but it wasn't pleasant so she didn't wan to do it anymore. Her EX bring her home the same day when she accepted his confession and forcefully try to have sex with her but broke up as she was screaming in pain please stop it. At first she was going to MC house on a whim but she fall in love with MC as he might be harsh but also caring.

For the last sentence it mean "Annoying", Mc boy ask her is it what she desire is only sex from him, she instantly replied "Yes, if i said i would like to go somewhere during holiday, go to school together everyday, hold hands together sometime you surely will say *Annoying*, right?"
The horse in the cover is a Rainbow 6 references not a beauty mark wtf?

Is there someone who can tell me what’s the main point of that story ? And if that girl do ? AV ? 
And what’s the meaning of her last sentence ? Is it a confess ?
Thanks in advance
Я не понимаю, но мне нравится.
